import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import HeroImage from './../projectPage/HeroImage.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroImage':require('./../../content/projects/pause/hero-image.png'), } const a = { 'title':'Breaking the Flow', 'text':"Pause is an app, targeted at adolescents, that aims to address excessive use of social networking sites by empowering the user to control their screen time. The longer the user scrolls, the longer content takes to load and the harder scrolling becomes, breaking the flow. This break is leveraged as a positive nudge to stop scrolling. Scrolling and loading speed will slowly recover as a reward when social media isn't being used. Pause is inspired by the EAST framework, making scrolling less easy and by using social and timely intervenions", 'image':require('./../../content/projects/pause/1.png'), } const b = { 'col':'col-2', 'height':'400px', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/pause/2.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/pause/3.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/pause/4.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/pause/5.png'), 'image5':require('./../../content/projects/pause/6.png'), 'image6':require('./../../content/projects/pause/7.png'), 'image7':require('./../../content/projects/pause/8.png'), 'image8':require('./../../content/projects/pause/9.png'), } const c = { 'image':require('./../../content/projects/pause/10.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/pause/18.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/pause/12.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/pause/13.png'), } const d = { 'image':require('./../../content/projects/pause/14.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/pause/15.png'), 'image3':require('./../../content/projects/pause/16.png'), 'image4':require('./../../content/projects/pause/17.png'), } function Pause(props) { return(
) } export default Pause;
